alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:52AM MST until March 10 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible in Glenwood Canyon. * WHERE...Central Colorado River Basin. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult at times due to icy and snow packed roadways. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
